channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Loosee manhole cover, 10th November
item.description:
Heading towards Barnwood. Making very loud noise everytime a vehicle hits it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More abandoned signage, 10th November
item.description:
Yet more abandoned signage. Been here unused for months & months. Left after works. On bridge from Brockworth on Hucclecote Road at traffic lights with bypass and Glos Biz Park. They'll fill a truck if they collect this & the SIX lots abandoned on the bypass itself.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Willow Tree 10 meters from property, 10th November
item.description:
Honeybourne Drive Cheltenham GL510QJ Tree situated on public footpath has been re-pollard over the years and is due maintenance. During highlands branches have been found on footpath and garden and the growth is very near the roof of 31 Honeybourne Drive Cheltenham GL510QJ

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Carlyle Grove, Hesters Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unlawful Sign, 10th November
item.description:

item.title: Temp traffic lights, 9th November
item.description:
Temporary traffic lights still in place after works Completed 6 hours ago ,spoil gone ,plastic barriers removed just the lights to go ? if still in place peek Hours Monday morning it s going to bring Cheltenham Road East to a standstill , Please please remove them ASAP??
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
